name: Edo Castle
skill: Restores 644/734 HP to all allies. Targets receive 63%/72% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: All melee allies take slightly less DMG
Moderately increases the skill DMG of all ranged allies

additional_data.description: The spirit of the largest castle in Japan. Edo Castle is known to accompany spirits who think of themselves as vassals of the state. Edo Castle was said to have been constructed with feng shui and yin-yang principles in mind, giving her the impressive defensive capabilities that she's become famous for. When Edo Castle is on the defensive, she casts a protective barrier, repelling any attacks an enemy may throw at those around her. In her benevolence, she turns a blind eye to injured foes, refusing to attack. It's undoubtedly this kindness that draws other spirits; it's not uncommon to see groups of spirits congregating around her.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 07/31/2017 - 09/30/2017
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)
